attributes.action: Give an immediate referendum on our future inclusion in European Union
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition calls on the Government to give an immediate referendum on our inclusion in Europe.
With Europe heading towards closer integration (socially, economically and militarily), it is now time to decide whether we want to be part of it or not.
This petition is not a campaign for a YES/NO vote, just for a vote.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
